thread.title: Whataburger creates mini Super Bowl stadium entirely made of food
thread.title_full: Whataburger creates mini Super Bowl stadium entirely made of food

author: Fernando Ramirez
title: Whataburger creates mini Super Bowl stadium entirely made of food
text:
Whataburger creates mini Super Bowl stadium entirely made of food 1 / 26 Back to Gallery 
For tourists visiting Houston to watch Super Bowl LI, many Texans might think it blasphemy to leave the Lone Star State without trying Whataburger. 
The Texas-based burger franchise recently made a strong pitch to hungry fans by creating a mini-stadium entirely made of food items off their menu. 
SUPER BOWL LI: Patriots launch improbable comeback to force overtime, win game 
Atlanta Falcons fans who might be wallowing defeat should consider eating Whataburger to get them through their depression. 
One Houston tourist who is already a step ahead in the culinary department is Vice President Mike Pence. Earlier today he tweeted from inside Pappas Bar-B-Q: "We can't pass up good BBQ." 
Click through above to see Twitter reactions to Lady Gaga's stunning half-time show. 
President Donald Trump has picked the New England Patriots as his winner for Super Bowl LI over the Atlanta Falcons. Media: Brandpoint
